# WKMediaCaptureType.camera

**Case**

A media device that can capture video.

## Declaration

```swift
case camera
```

## Constants

- **WKMediaCaptureType.cameraAndMicrophone**: A media device or devices that can capture audio and video.
- **WKMediaCaptureType.microphone**: A media device that can capture audio.

items.description: A media device or devices that can capture audio and video.

items.description: A media device that can capture audio.
